description: Founder of Mothtasia, leader of Triple Venus, main artist: Lorraine B. Mori - Legal representative, caretaker, first of heir: Andie M. - We're two Plural Queers fighting for Revolution - Lorraine is permanently physically disabled due to targeted violence, with the damage to her genitals making her a candidate for one of the first to receive MtFtN(eutrois) SRS - Andie helps keeps Lorraine alive - In Queer ecdysis together; creating Change through Beauty. - Much Love <3
